entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
